# ImageTranslationAlignmentObservation

**Structure**

Affine transform information that an image-alignment request produces.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ImageTranslationAlignmentObservation
```

## Overview

This type of observation results from a [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/TrackTranslationalImageRegistrationRequest], informing the [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/ImageTranslationAlignmentObservation/alignmentTransform] performed to align the input images.

## Creating an observation

- **init(_:)**: Creates a translation alignment observation.

## Inspecting an observation

- **alignmentTransform**: The alignment transform to align the floating image with the reference image.

## Applying a transform

- **applyTransform(to:)**: Applies the transform to an image.

## Performing a request

- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on an image URL and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on image data and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Graphics image and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a pixel buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Media buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Image image and produces observations.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- VisionObservation
